external_games.name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Space Infantry Above and Beyond Battle Pack 1

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Space Infantry Above and Beyond - Battle Pack 1
summary: Lock 'n Load Tactical Series now heads in the world of Science Fiction adding the Space Infantry Above and Beyond as an expansion game. You will test your tactical acumen as the determined Space Infantry and Colonial Guard advisors of the Imperium.
